piskvorky_server

Class Server.ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • piskvorky_server.Server.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    private class Server.ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    for every connected user, there will be a special thread maintaining a communication with him (listening to his socket)
